name: Elite Kobold
description: The Elite Kobold is a small humanoid creature with a cunning and tactical mindset typical of its kind, equipped with leather armor.
memorable: Offers a mix of combat prowess and unique tactical benefits via teamwork.
goals: To aid allies and create strategic advantages in battles.
relations: Often found working in groups with other Kobolds.
environment: Typically found in caves or underground areas.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances stealth and ranged attacks, tactical abilities like Pack Tactics.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity hampers effectiveness in bright environments.
attacks: Uses a mining pick for melee and a sling for ranged attacks, splashes burning oil for area control.
most_powerful_ability: Lantern Splash deals significant fire damage in an area and can control the battlefield.
senses: Possesses darkvision allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light, and has a passive perception score of 14.
skills: Proficient in perception and stealth, making it vigilant against surprise attacks.
additional_information: Can burrow through non-rocky soil when working with another Kobold.
Gains advantage on attack rolls against targets with nearby allies.
Can create damaging area effects with combined actions.
Utilizes a mix of melee and ranged attacks effectively.
